login.title: Sign in to Batwo
login.subtitle: Access all features of our AI marketing solution
login.devMode: Dev mode: Meta login is restricted to test users
login.termsPrefix: By signing in, you agree to Batwo's

errors.Configuration: Server configuration error. Please contact administrator.
errors.AccessDenied: Access denied. Please check your permissions.
errors.Verification: Verification link has expired or has already been used.
errors.OAuthSignin: Error occurred while starting OAuth login.
errors.EmailCreateAccount: Error occurred while creating email account.
errors.OAuthAccountNotLinked: This email is already registered with another method. Please use your existing login method.
errors.invalid_scope: Meta app permission settings required. Please contact administrator.
errors.invalid_redirect_uri: OAuth redirect URL is not registered.
errors.access_denied: Meta login was denied. Please try again.
errors.Default: Error occurred during login. Please try again.

empty.title: No campaigns yet
empty.description: Create your first campaign to start marketing

metaConnect.title: Connect Meta Ad Account
metaConnect.cardDescription: Connect your Meta (Facebook/Instagram) ad account to manage campaigns

whyConnect.title: Why connect your Meta account?
whyConnect.description: Connecting enables powerful AI-driven marketing features

adsRead.title: View Ad Performance
adsRead.description: Access real-time campaign metrics including ROAS, CTR, and conversions

adsManagement.title: Optimize Campaigns
adsManagement.description: Receive AI-powered recommendations to improve ad performance

businessManagement.title: Multi-Account Management
businessManagement.description: Manage multiple ad accounts from a single dashboard

pagesAccess.title: Page Insights
pagesAccess.description: Analyze engagement data from your Facebook and Instagram pages

metaConnect.selectCardDescription: Multiple ad accounts found. Select an account to connect.
metaConnect.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect your Meta ad account?
metaConnect.selectNote: Manage ad campaigns with the selected account
metaConnect.connectNote: Meta ad management permissions will be requested

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.description: Your session has expired for security. Please reconnect.

notConnected.title: Connect Your Meta Account
notConnected.description: To view campaign data, please connect your Meta ad account first.
notConnected.dashboardDescription: Connect your Meta account to see real-time KPIs and AI insights on your dashboard.

aiInsights.title: AI Insights
aiInsights.empty: AI will provide insights once campaign data is collected.

roasOpportunity.title: ROAS Improvement Opportunity
roasOpportunity.description: Campaign A's weekend performance is 32% higher than weekdays. Increasing weekend budget by 15% could raise overall ROAS by ~0.3x.

budgetWarning.title: Budget Depletion Warning
budgetWarning.description: At the current spend rate, Campaign B's daily budget will be depleted around 3 PM. Consider increasing the budget.

targetingTip.title: Targeting Optimization Suggestion
targetingTip.description: Conversion rate for women aged 25-34 is 2.1x higher than other groups. We recommend increasing bids for this target.

weeklySuccess.title: Excellent Performance This Week
weeklySuccess.description: CTR increased by 18% compared to last week. The new creative strategy is proving effective.

empty.title: No notifications
empty.description: We'll notify you here when campaign performance anomalies are detected.

welcome.title: Welcome to Batwo
welcome.description: Maximize your advertising performance with AI-powered marketing solutions

feature1.title: Real-time Performance Analysis
feature1.description: View campaign KPIs at a glance and gain insights

feature2.title: AI Optimization Recommendations
feature2.description: Receive customized optimization suggestions analyzed by AI

metaConnect.title: Connect Meta Ad Account
metaConnect.description: Connect your Meta (Facebook/Instagram) ad account to automatically sync campaign data
metaConnect.connectedNext: Proceed to the next step to complete setup
metaConnect.connectLater: You can also connect your account later in settings

dataCollection.title: Information collected upon connection
dataCollection.item1: Ad campaign performance data (impressions, clicks, conversions)

pixelSetup.title: Pixel Setup
pixelSetup.description: Install Meta Pixel to track website visitor behavior and run conversion-optimized ads
pixelSetup.connectFirst: Please connect your Meta account first. You can do this in the previous step.

installation.title: Installation Guide
installation.description: Add the script below to your website's <head> tag
installation.skipMessage: You can also install the pixel later in settings.

completion.title: Setup Complete!
completion.description: You're now ready to use all features of Batwo
